lyrics.en: Look up at the horizon together as one
lyrics.zh: 彼此的心緊繫一起同仰遠方的地平線

lyrics.en: A star is on the rise and it's only begun
lyrics.zh: 一顆亮星正冉冉升起 這僅僅代表一個開端

lyrics.en: The pivotal moment we're clamoring for
lyrics.zh: 我們所夢寐以求的重大時刻

lyrics.en: An infinite future is at our door
lyrics.zh: 趨於無限的未來就近在咫尺

lyrics.en: It's a timeless story with a new feel
lyrics.zh: 這是別具着新鮮感的雋永故事

lyrics.en: Not just allegory, it's real
lyrics.zh: 並非單純的寓言 而是真實的神話

lyrics.en: Wake up, big dreams about to come true
lyrics.zh: 甦醒過來 偌大的夢想即將成真

lyrics.en: That means it's time to break through
lyrics.zh: 這正意味突破之時已然迎來

lyrics.en: Never knew we could make it so far
lyrics.zh: 我們從未想過走得如此之遠

lyrics.en: But we're striving, thriving
lyrics.zh: 全因努力奮鬥 堅持不懈

lyrics.en: Here we are, achieving the impossible
lyrics.zh: 我們才能立足此地 將不可能一一實現

lyrics.en: We're virtually unstoppable
lyrics.zh: 我們實則勢不可擋

lyrics.en: We can't sit still
lyrics.zh: 無法光是一昧等待

lyrics.en: We just keep moving
lyrics.zh: 惟有不斷邁步往前

lyrics.en: Now everybody sing!
lyrics.zh: 現在大家一齊高歌！

lyrics.en: We're making our way to the next dimension
lyrics.zh: 我們會邁向下一個全新次元

lyrics.en: We'll reinvent the world that we live in
lyrics.zh: 重新塑造現身處的這個世界

lyrics.en: We'll greet every day with new intentions
lyrics.zh: 懷着新的意想去迎接每一天

lyrics.en: Break conventions, run right through！ (This is it！)
lyrics.zh: 打破既有常規 畢直勇往向前！ (就是這樣！)

lyrics.en: Been smashing barriers left and right (That's our Myth！)
lyrics.zh: 衝破圍堵四周的障礙 (那便是我們締造的神話！)

lyrics.en: Strong as we ever were scaling heights (It's endless！)
lyrics.zh: 伴隨始終如一的堅強 攀越每個高峰 (永不止盡於此！)

lyrics.en: So get together, let's reunite
lyrics.zh: 同聚此處 再聚一起！

lyrics.en: Reach up, reach out, the future's bright
lyrics.zh: 伸出雙手 延伸出去 未來一片光明

lyrics.en: We've been together for what feels like an eternity
lyrics.zh: 相伴的光陰感覺如同永恆一般

lyrics.en: The times are changing but we're ready for infinity, yeah
lyrics.zh: 雖然時光荏苒 但我們已然準備好迎接無限的未來

lyrics.en: Our stories align
lyrics.zh: 眾人的故事重合交織

lyrics.en: We're gonna go far when we combine
lyrics.zh: 攜手同行之際我們定能走得更遠

lyrics.en: So look at the horizon and then look beyond
lyrics.zh: 聚睛地平線上 展望更遠前方

lyrics.en: We'll marvel at the skies and the strength of our bond
lyrics.zh: 為廣袤的蒼穹與彼此間的強大羈絆而深感驚嘆

lyrics.en: We're making a vow to the smiling stars
lyrics.zh: 向閃爍微笑的星星許下誓言

lyrics.en: A powerful moment, that's all ours
lyrics.zh: 這是徹底屬於我們的強大一刻～

lyrics.en: The seasons change, but we keep shining
lyrics.zh: 即使季節更迭 我們依然會綻放耀光

lyrics.en: Now everybody sing
lyrics.zh: 現在大家一齊高歌

lyrics.en: Keep it going
lyrics.zh: (讓歌聲延續下去！)

lyrics.en: We're making our way to the next dimension
lyrics.zh: 我們會邁向下一個全新次元

lyrics.en: A million thrills in every direction
lyrics.zh: 每一方位都充滿無數的雀躍

lyrics.en: We'll give every mile our full attention
lyrics.zh: 為一步一里全神貫注

lyrics.en: Breaking tension, breaking through (We won't miss！)
lyrics.zh: 打破僵持 突破困境 (不放過任何機會！)

lyrics.en: With endless energy, stronger ties (we got this！)
lyrics.zh: 以無窮活力締結更緊密的牽繫 (一定可以辦到！)

lyrics.en: A perfect harmony we devise (We Promise！)
lyrics.zh: 創造出完美的和諧 (我們在此承諾！)

lyrics.en: So clap along with me (Time to rise！)
lyrics.zh: 隨我一同拍手 (是時候站起來！)

lyrics.en: The future's right before our eyes.
lyrics.zh: 未來就在我們的咫尺眼前

lyrics.en: A new dimension of freedom that we've found, (Yeah, we've made it)
lyrics.zh: 千辛萬苦覓得自由的新次元 (我們成功做到了)

lyrics.en: We're breaking out of the mold, no longer bound (We're unlimited)
lyrics.zh: 逃出固有的定型 不再受到束縛 (我們無拘無束)

lyrics.en: We're gonna spring to life and break the chains
lyrics.zh: 我們將重活新生 掙脫身上的枷鎖

lyrics.en: Turn up the hype, can't be contained
lyrics.zh: 大肆宣示自身的存在 絕不容許受遏止控制

lyrics.en: We're shaking up the status quo
lyrics.zh: 我們正在扭轉現狀

lyrics.en: No time to stop, we're good to go！
lyrics.zh: 無暇停下 我們已經準備就緒！

lyrics.en: The whole wide world is listening,
lyrics.zh: 世界的每片角落都在傾耳細聽

lyrics.en: So everybody sing！
lyrics.zh: 所以大家齊來放聲歌唱！

lyrics.en: We're making our way to the next dimension
lyrics.zh: 我們會邁向下一個全新次元

lyrics.en: We're living out the dreams we believe in
lyrics.zh: 活出我們心中堅信的夢想

lyrics.en: Excitement beyond our comprehension
lyrics.zh: 那份興奮超乎想像理解

lyrics.en: There's no question we'll break through！ (Don't relent！)
lyrics.zh: 毫無疑問我們定必將其衝破！ (不要畏怯退縮！)

lyrics.en: We'll keep aspiring to excel (It's Advent！)
lyrics.zh: 我們會不斷追求精益求精 (將臨到來！)

lyrics.en: It's awe-inspiring, going well (Represent！)
lyrics.zh: 展現凛然之姿 一切如意順遂 (抗言發聲！)

lyrics.en: So light the fire and let's rebel！
lyrics.zh: 燃起狼煙 奮起反抗！

lyrics.en: The future's brighter, we can tell！
lyrics.zh: 未來將更光明 我們可以預見！
